DOC.brief_summary: The study investigates the long term safety and immunogenicity of the Japanese Encephalitis vaccine IC51 up to month 60.
DOC.brief_title: Longterm Immunogenicity of the Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine IC51
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects at least 18 years of age Written informed consent obtained prior to study entry Subjects correctly included and having completed clinical studies IC51301 (NCT00604708) and IC51302 (NCT00605085) with at least one vaccination Inability or unwillingness to provide informed consent and to abide the requirements of the study
